version_description:
New special event alert!

Uh-oh! Rancid the Raccoon is out for revenge! He’s covered the farmlands with toxic goo as far the eye can see.

It’s your job to help the Farm Heroes and defeat Rancid before it’s too late and he changes the land forever!

Be sure to update to the latest version for all the new content!

New special event alert!

Uh-oh! Rancid the Raccoon is out for revenge! He’s covered the farmlands with toxic goo as far the eye can see.

It’s your job to help the Farm Heroes and defeat Rancid before it’s too late and he changes the land forever!

Be sure to update to the latest version for all the new content!

New special event alert!

Uh-oh! Rancid the Raccoon is out for revenge! He’s covered the farmlands with toxic goo as far the eye can see.

It’s your job to help the Farm Heroes and defeat Rancid before it’s too late and he changes the land forever!

Be sure to update to the latest version for all the new content!

FARMTASTIC news farmers!

Wait no more, because new episodes are coming soon and bugs have been fixed.

Also, Rancid managed to get his hands on some levels, making them Super Hard! Can you spot them?

Be sure to update to the latest version of the game to play them all!

Oh no! Rancid wreaked a little bit of havoc on the farm! We’ve made some improvements to keep him at bay… for now!

Don't let him brag about it, match those Cropsies and make them as happy as they should be!

Update to the latest version of the game for the best playing experience!

Think you can take on me?!

Pfft, as if! These 15 NEW LEVELS will have you shaking like washing machine on a spin cycle. Game on humans, game on!

Rancid the Raccoon

Some lil’ dog that goes by the name of Hunter told me you wanted a NEW EPISODE and NEW LEVELS. I’m not usually one to listen to anyone but myself, but thought you could do with some cheering up after I beat you last time.

So here you have it, enjoy the new content in this update. And as always, good luck defeating me. You’re going to need it!

Rancid the Raccoon
Sigh, Rancid the Troublemaker has been causing problems again! You and your Cropsies will be fine though! Just ignore him and update your app to discover all the farmtastic new levels!
Yeehaw, It’s all fixed! Just update your app to play the new farmtastic levels! Thanks for your patience! And remember to never give up if Rancid or other troublemakers try to make life hard for you!

Oh no! Rancid wreaked a little bit of havoc on the farm! We’ve made some improvements to keep him at bay… for now!

Don't let him brag about it, match those Cropsies and make them as happy as they should be!

Save away!
Howdy Farmer! Amelia needs to save more to achieve her goals for 2018. Show her how it’s done by saving your Gold Bars in your Piggy Bank. Do it now!
